name: Shah Rukh Khan
summary: Shah Rukh Khan. Actor: Don 2. Shah Rukh Khan was born on November 02, 1965 in New Delhi to Meer Taj Mohammed Khan & Lateef Fatima Khan. He also has an elder sister, Shehnaz Lalarukh. He spent his early days in Bangalore with his grandparents. His father used to run a restaurant in Delhi. His father died in 1981 and mother in 1991. And after the death of their parents,...
